wikipedia_page.main: Gordon Jones (born 1 February 1889; date of death unknown) was an English footballer who played for Bedlington St Andrews, Melrose, Birkenhead, Bolton Wanderers, Tottenham Hotspur, Chester City, South Liverpool, Hurst, Crichtons Athletic, Wrexham, Connah's Quay, Flint Town United.

response: *Gordon Jones (footballer born 1886) (1886–1977), Builth F.C. and Wales international footballer
*Gordon Jones (footballer, born 1889), English football player for Bolton Wanderers, Tottenham Hotspur and several other clubs
*Gordon Jones (footballer, born 1943), English football player for Middlesbrough
*Gordon Jones (actor) (1911–1963), noted for playing the Green Hornet in a movie serial
